name: Amethyst Shard
effectText: Gain 1꒔. Any ally may draw a card and then discard a card in hand.
flavorText: There is an irony to the weaponsmith that is best described as blunt.

name: Buried Light
effectText: Cast: Deal 1 damage. Gain 1꒔.
flavorText: Hers is a fire that burns bright and with a single purpose: to deliver us back to The World That Was, no matter what cost.

name: Emerald Shard
effectText:
Gain 1꒔.
OR
Any player gains 1 life.
flavorText: The caves run deep in Gravehold, ssome say to a shadow city even older than time. Yet none have delved as deep as Kadir.

name: Flare
effectText: Cast: Reveal the top card of the turn order deck, and then place it back on top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, deal 3 damage. Otherwise, deal 1 damage.
flavorText: The other mages do not fully trust Xaxos, for there is a darkness they perceive in his words.

name: Garnet Shard
effectText:
Gain 1꒔.
OR
Cast any player's prepped spell.
flavorText: Thrice has she walked into the breach to face them, a feat not yet attempted by other mages.

name: Moonstone Shard
effectText: Gain 1꒔. Gain an additional 1꒔ that can only be used to gain a gem.
flavorText: Like many children of Gravehold, Jian was left an orphan, stricken silent by the very thing that took her father's light.

name: Quartz Shard
effectText: Gain 1꒔. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. You may place that card on the bottom or the top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, gain an additional 1꒔.
flavorText: Laughter is scarce these days in Gravehold, yet Lash manages to conjure a smile in most he meets.

name: Tourmaline Shard
effectText: Gain 1꒔. Any ally may suffer 1 damage. If they do, they destroy a card in hand.
flavorText: Phaedraxa is burdened with a sense beyond sight. Only she remembers The World That Was.

name: Crystal
effectText: Gain 1꒔.
flavorText: The aether is trapped in even the simplest of stones. Now these gems grant us the same power that put our world low. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

flavorText: The sister-mages of old would wear their talismans as a symbol of their station and a warning to those that would challenge them.

effectText:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may return a gem you played this turn to your hand.
Cast: Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: The taint of aether clings to everything in Gravehold. And we that survived near-extinction reek with it, too. - Nerva, Survivor

flavorText: Many folk have made their fortune harvesting gems. The very breaches through which The Nameless come bestow the stones with strange properties.

effectText: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may lose 1 charge to deal 2 additional damage.
flavorText: In The World That Was, there were great birds, born of fire and ash. They were thought to be immortal, and yet none now remain. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

Cast: Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: Sometimes a little motivation is needed for dire situations. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Agony Field
effectText:
To Discard: Destroy a card in hand that costs 2꒔ or more.
Power 2: Unleash. Any player discards three cards in hand and then draws one card.
flavorText: Every breath is torment. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Bane Sire
effectText: Persistent: Unleash.
flavorText: Best to kill these first. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Bleed Static
effectText: Power 3: The player with the most prepped spells suffers 2 damage for each of their prepped spells.
flavorText: There are no words to describe the sound of a breach opening. Only the screams echoing off the cave walls after. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Eye of Nothing
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 6꒔.
Power 2: Unleash twice.
flavorText: We toy with forces we barely comprehend. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Haze Spewer
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life. Then, this minion suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: The fumes they belch are so caustic that they rarely live long themselves.

name: Skewer
effectText: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and draws a card.
flavorText: It takes years to train a breach mage properly, but only a second to snuff one out. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Slaughter
effectText: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
flavorText: We have nothing left to lose but our lives. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Woven Sky
effectText:
To Discard: Discard three cards in hand.
Power 2: Unleash. Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: Nym looked up in awe as Malastar pointed to the roiling air at the dome of the cave. Those, boy, are stars.

name: Awaken
effectText:
Unleash twice and Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
OR
Place the most recently discarded minion card in the nemesis discard pile back into play.
flavorText: They were always just outside the edge of our knowing, sitting there in some quiet abyss just waiting to visit ruin upon us. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Cauterizer
effectText:
When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.
Persistent: Any player suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.
flavorText: Hack away all you like, youngling. It will only grow back another... whatever that part is. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Dispel
effectText: Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells discards their most expensive prepped spell.
flavorText: The words and gestures needed left him, and the breach grew dim. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Needlemaw
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: The teeth of this beast make a fine trophy. The trick is keeping all your fingers in the taking of them. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Lay Waste
effectText: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: Gravehold sat silent and forgotten for a thousand ages before The Nameless came. No one remembers for whom this vast city was built. Those stories lay in the ash outside the cave with the bones of those who once told them.

name: Pulverizing Ray
effectText: Power 1: Gravehold suffers 18 damage. The players may collectively discard up to six gems. For each gem discarded this way, prevent 3 of that damage.
flavorText: The ground absorbed the latent energy left by the first breaches ever opened. Without this to fuel our spells, our fate would be certain. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Venomite
effectText:
Persistent: The player with the lowest life suffers 2 damage.
OR
Any player discards a prepped spell that costs 3꒔ or more.
flavorText: In The World That Was, there were many creatures that used poison as a means of survival. But these things ARE poison. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Doom Aegis
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 1: The player with the most charges suffers 4 damage and loses all of their charges.
flavorText: There is a saying: all wars must end. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Gather Darkness
effectText: Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck, shuffles it, and then destroys the top four cards of their deck. Then, Unleash twice.
flavorText: The Nameless do not die, for they themselves are death. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Jagged One
effectText: Persistent: Unleash twice.
flavorText: Jagged ones are the heralds of The Nameless, leading legions in siege after siege of Gravehold.

name: Obliterate
effectText: Unleash twice. The player with the most opened breaches destroys four cards in hand or suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: While the breaches amplify our magic a thousandfold, it comes at the highest ransom imaginable. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Reality Rupture
effectText:
To Discard: Destroy two prepped spells that each cost 3꒔ or more.
Power 1: Unleash three times.
flavorText: The world shattered in a blink, and in the ruin I glimpsed the other side of the void. - Phaedraxa, Breach Mage Seer

name: Sunder
effectText:
Gravehold suffers 4 damage and the player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.
OR
Shuffle all of the nemesis turn order cards into the turn order deck.
flavorText: We fight for the lingering hope of returning to The World That Was, but in our hearts we know our future lies within these caves. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Topple
effectText: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: LOOK OU--, Last words of Quilion Rafe, Far Hollow watchman

name: Broodwomb
effectText:
If there is at least one husk in play, prevent all damage dealt to this minion.
Persistent: Place a husk in play.
flavorText: It is the husk-mother, spewing multitudes through the void into Gravehold.

name: Endless Throng
effectText: Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavorText: The Queen, she is the worst of their foul lot, for her young are without number. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Hatch
effectText: Place a husk into play for each turn order card in the turn order discard pile.
flavorText: The Queen wears her offspring like some writhing armor.

name: Blot the Sun
effectText:
To Discard: Lose 4 charges.
Power 2: Carapace Queen Swarms. Unleash. Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavorText: Were we still in The World That Was, these wretched things would envelop the very sky. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Foul Multitudes
effectText:
Husks have 2 life. Damaged husks heal to full life at the end of each turn.
Immediately: Unleash.
Power 3: Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavorText: It took the survivors of Gravehold half-a-moon to shovel up the dead husks and carry them into the depths, where they now lie in piles high enough to touch the tops of the cave vaults.

name: Infest
effectText:
Carapace Queen Swarms twice.
OR
Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: Husks are easy enough to dispatch... one on one, that is. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Legion Beacon
effectText:
Immediately: Unleash twice.
Power 2: Discard half of the husks in play, rounded up. Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each husks discarded this way. Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavorText: Gravehold knows when the Queen is near, for the claxon call of her legions echoes throughout the cave.

name: Maggot Engine
effectText:
Immediately: Unleash three times. Then, set this minion's life equal to twice the number of husks in play.
Persistent: Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavorText: Which end is the head? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Spawn
effectText: Carapace Queen Swarms. Unleash. Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavorText: The sound of the things, skittering across the cave walls, is loud enough to drown our screams. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Burden
effectText: The players collectively gain two corruptions and place them on top of their decks. Any player focuses a breach.
flavorText: It's the only thing that smiles more than me. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Corrupter
effectText:
When this minion suffers damage, the player who dealt that damage gains a corruption and places it on top of their deck.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: The Corrupters are but a shadow of the Crooked Mask, bringing madness to all that have endured its pollution.

name: Tempt
effectText: The player with the most Crystals in hand discards all of their Crystals, suffers 3 damage, and gains a card from any supply pile that costs 4꒔ or less.
flavorText: There is a dust that fills the air when a hole is torn through the wall of the world. For some it is just that, dust. But for others, it warps the mind and grants strange power.

name: Pain Sower
effectText: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage. A different player focuses a breach.
flavorText: Even its beasts seem to delight in lunacy. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Twisting Madness
effectText:
To Discard: Discard four cards in hand and draw one card.
Power 2: Gravehold gains 3 life. Crooked Mask gains 13 life.
flavorText: Is it laughing at us? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Vex
effectText: Discard the top two cards of the nemesis deck. For each tier 3 nemesis card discarded this way, Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: It is one thing to swing a sword or beckon flame from the void. But it is another act indeed to fight blinding madness from within. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Afflict
effectText: Two different players each gain two corruptions and place them on top of their decks. Each of those player gains 1 life.
flavorText: It was as if a whisper echoed behind my eyes, tempting me to stray into the raw abyss, - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Bedlam Sage
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold gains 2 life. The player with the most life suffers 3 damage.
flavorText: Employing a complex stratagem against such an unpredictable foe is beyond foolish. Instinct is our only and best weapon. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Ruin Priest
effectText: Persistent: Any player discards three non-corruption cards. That player gains three corruptions and places them into their hand.
flavorText: In the dark, there is a light. And in madness, there is reason. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Blind Abandon
effectText: Suffer 1 damage. You may destroy a non-corruption card in hand. Destroy this.
flavorText: Our lives matter not in the end. We are mere fodder to these beings, an inconvenient obstacle, no more. What matters is that we take them with us when we go back to oblivion. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Contagion
effectText: Suffer 1 damage. Return any card that costs 0꒔ in your discard pile to your hand. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask brings a sickness that spreads, like black wings, across a mage's mind.

name: Delirium Veil
effectText: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Focus a breach. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask grants a power too vast to be contained.

name: Dire Wisdom
effectText: Gain a spell from any spell supply pile. Gain three corruptions and place them on top of your deck. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask enhances magical abilities even as it scatters the wits.

name: Endless Hunger
effectText: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Gain 2 life. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask bestows an empty greed that cannot be slaked.

name: Fever of War
effectText: Suffer 1 damage. Deal 2 damage. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask preaches pain as a virtue.

name: Grim Sight
effectText: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Reveal the top card of your deck. You may destroy it. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask guides all toward oblivion.

name: Insatiable Avarice
effectText: Suffer 2 damage. Gain a gem from the least expensive supply pile and place it into your hand. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask blesses the covetous.

name: Lust for Power
effectText: Suffer 1 damage. Gain 1 charge. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask venerates those who wield destruction.

name: Nothingness
effectText: Discard two non-corruption cards. Suffers 2 damage. Shuffle any player's turn order card into the turn order deck. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask shackles the self.

name: Reckless Might
effectText: Gain a relic from any relic supply pile and place it on top of your deck. Suffer damage equal to half its cost, rounded up. Destroy this.
flavorText: The Crooked Mask consumes our fear of extermination.

name: Gorge
effectText: Devour two cards from the second most expensive gem supply pile. Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: So much of our history was lost in the first Purge. Aeons of knowledge, art, and culture erased. It has been so very long that we know not even the true name of The World That Was. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Lobotomize
effectText:
Any player suffers 3 damage.
OR
Devour three spells from any spell supply pile.
flavorText: I saw the woman's eyes empty and everything she was fall away into nothing. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Thought Biter
effectText:
Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage.
OR
Devour two relics from the least expensive relic supply pile.
flavorText: Is it eating the cave wall? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Cerephage
effectText: Persistent: Devour cards equal to this minion's life from one supply pile. Then, this minion suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: Quickly. Before our heads are hollow. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Godfeeders
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Devour a gem from the most expensive gem supply pile.
flavorText: The Prince exploits these creatures to both mend its wounds and sate its hunger.

name: Mindguzzler
effectText:
Immediately: Set this minion's life equal to 8 plus the number of empty supply piles.
Persistent: Unleash.

name: Digest
effectText:
Unleash three times.
OR
Any player suffers damage equal to the number of empty supply piles.
flavorText: The Prince feasts on the memories of those left in Gravehold, consuming their very histories.

name: Memory Eater
effectText: Persistent: The player with the lowest life suffers damage equal to the number of empty supply piles.
flavorText: Sometimes I think it a blessing to have forgotten so much of my past. - Phaedraxa, Breach Mage Seer

name: Vile Feast
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each empty supply pile.
flavorText: It aims to make us forget what is at stake. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Cleave
effectText: Rageborne Strikes.
flavorText: Thraxir was breach commander for as long as most could remember. To honor him, to this very day no man or woman has been elected to the post in his stead.

name: Provoker
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of Fury tokens Rageborne has.
flavorText: I nearly wasted a freshly forged chopper on one of these things. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Unrelenting Ire
effectText: Unleash. If there are two nemesis turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, Unleash two additional times.
flavorText: I reckon its head would look good on a post. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Blood Cry
effectText:
To Discard: Lose 4 charges.
Power 2: Unleash four times.
flavorText: The cave walls crumble and quake as it bellows to its kin.

name: Invoke Carnage
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage. That player suffers 1 additional damage for each Fury token Rageborne has.
flavorText: There is but a single power among The Nameless that can shatter Gravehold. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Scorn
effectText:
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
OR
Unleash twice.
flavorText: Part of me almost admires the craftmanship of this horrible thing. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Avatar of Wrath
effectText: Persistent: Rageborne Strikes.
flavorText: Many a mage found their end in the gullet of this beast.

name: Onslaught
effectText: Unleash three times. The players collectively discard cards in hand equal to the number of Fury tokens Rageborne has.
flavorText: Even its shadow leaves a wake of carnage, smoke, and screams.

name: Rolling Death
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Rageborne Strikes twice.
flavorText: Its breath rasped as it turned the black rocks red. And those who could, ran. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Convoke
effectText: Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: No other thing, in our world or theirs, has been so violent as this beast. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Devastate
effectText: Gravehold suffers 5 damage.
flavorText: Anger is born in fire. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Eviscerate
effectText: The player with the lowest life suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: The breach commander Thraxir was split in twain with a single blow, his armor twisted and glowing like a brand. I have never seen such a thing before or since. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Frenzy
effectText: The player with the most opened breaches suffers 3 damage.
flavorText: All great armies have a warrior that is feared above all others. We call theirs Rageborne. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Raze
effectText: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: The fire spread from the old barracks to the south wall in a moment, the ancient stone hissing and turning black as the beast strode through the city. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Seize
effectText: The players collectively discard the two most expensive prepped spells.
flavorText: How this cave has not long ago collapsed is a wonder and a mercy. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Turn Reminder
effectText:
Player Turn
Casting Phase
You may Cast any of your prepped spells in opened breaches. You must Cast any of your prepped spells in closed breaches. Place cast spells on top of your discard pile as they are cast.
Main Phase
You may resolve the following actions in any order and as many times as you want:
• Play a gem or relic card
• Gain a card
• Gain a charge
• Focus a breach
• Open a breach
• Prep a spell to a breach
• Resolve a "While prepped" effect
• Resolve a "To Discard" effect
Draw Phase Place all the gems and relics that you have played this turn on top of your discard pile in any order you choose. Draw cards from the top of your deck until you have five cards in your hand.
Nemesis Turn
Main Phase
From oldest to newest, resolve the effect of each power card and the Persistent: effect of each minion card the nemesis has in play.
Draw Phase
Draw a card from the nemesis deck.
• If it is an attack card: Resolve its effect immediately.
• If it is a minion card or a power card:
Place it into play with the appropriate number of life or power tokens.
Resolve any effects following "Immediately:" on the card.
The rest of its effects will not be resolve this turn.
When Exhausted
• Unleash twice.
• Destroy one of your breaches.
• Discard all of your charge tokens.
• Deal excess damage (x2) to Gravehold.

name: Burning Opal
effectText: Gain 3꒔. You may discard a card in hand. If you do, any ally draws a card.

name: Clouded Sapphire
effectText: Gain 3꒔. If this is the first time you have played Clouded Sapphire this turn, any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Diamond Cluster
effectText: Gain 2꒔. If this is the second time you have played Diamond Cluster this turn, gain an additional 2꒔.

name: Jade
effectText: Gain 2꒔.

name: Searing Ruby
effectText: Gain 2꒔. Gain an additional 1꒔ that can only be used to gain a spell.

name: Sifter's Pearl
effectText: Gain 2꒔. Each player reveals the top card of their deck and either discards it or returns it to the top of their deck.

name: V'riswood Amber
effectText:
When you gain this, you may place it on top of your deck.
Gain 2 ꒔.

name: Blasting Staff
effectText: You may cast a prepped spell that you prepped this turn. If you do, that spell deals 2 additional damage.

name: Cairn Compass
effectText: Any ally may prep a spell in their discard pile to their opened or closed breach(es).

name: Bottled Vortex
effectText: Destroy this. Destroy up to two cards in your hand or discard pile. Draw a card.

name: Flexing Dagger
effectText:
The next time you focus or open a breach this turn, it costs 3꒔ less.
OR
Destroy this. Deal 1 damage.

name: Focusing Orb
effectText:
Focus any player's breach.
OR
Destroy this. Gravehold gains 3 life.

name: Mage's Talisman
effectText: Gain 1 charge. Any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Unstable Prism
effectText:
Play a gem in hand twice and destroy it.
OR
Gain 2꒔.

name: Amplify Vision
effectText: Cast: Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost. Deal 2 damage. If all of your breaches are opened, deal 1 additional damage.

name: Arcane Nexus
effectText:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may return a gem you played this turn to your hand.
Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Chaos Arc
effectText: Cast: Deal 3 damage. Deal 2 additional damage for each prepped spell in an adjacent breach.

name: Consuming Void
effectText: Cast: Destroy up to two cards in hand. Deal 3 damage for each card destroyed in this way.

name: Dark Fire
effectText: Cast: Discard up to two cards in hand. Deal 3 damage for each card discarded this way.

name: Essence Theft
effectText: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may discard a card in hand. If you do, any player gains 1 life.

name: Feral Lightning
effectText:
This spell may be prepped to a closed breach without focusing it.
Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Ignite
effectText: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Lava Tendril
effectText:
While prepped, at the end of your casting phase, deal 1 damage.
Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Oblivion Swell
effectText:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase, you may gain 1꒔.
Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may discard a gem. If you do, deal additional damage equal to its cost.

name: Phoenix Flame
effectText: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may lose 1 charge to deal 2 additional damage.

name: Planar Insight
effectText: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each of your opened breaches.

name: Spectral Echo
effectText: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may destroy a card in hand.

name: Wildfire Whip
effectText:
While prepped, during your main phase, you may spend 2꒔ to cast any player's prepped spell.
Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Transmogrifier
effectText: Destroy a card in hand. You may gain a card from any supply pile that costs up to 3꒔ more than the destroyed card.

name: Vim Dynamo
effectText:
Suffer 1 damage. Any player draws two cards.
OR
Destroy this. Any player gains 2 life and 1 charge.

name: Combustion
effectText:
Cast: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Deal 2 damage to a different minion or the nemesis.
(Effects that modify damage affect both instances of damage this spell deals.)

name: Devouring Shadow
effectText:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase, you may destroy a card in hand.
Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Disintegrating Scythe
effectText: Cast: Deal 8 damage. Suffer 1 damage. Instead of discarding this, destroy it or place it on top of any player's discard pile.

name: Monstrous Inferno
effectText:
This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches.
Cast: Deal 7 damage divided however you choose to the nemesis and any number of minions.

name: Void Bond
effectText: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may cast any player's prepped spell.

name: Leeching Agate
effectText:
When you gain this, gain 1 charge.
Gain 2꒔.

name: Molten Hammer
effectText: Gain 1 charge. You may destroy a card in hand or on top of any player's discard pile.

name: Temporal Helix
effectText: Cast any player's prepped spell without discarding it.

name: Blaze
effectText:
When you gain this, you may place it on top of any player's discard pile.
Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each other time you have cast Blaze this turn and for each other Blaze you currently have prepped.

name: Radiance
effectText: Cast: Deal 5 damage. Each ally draws a card.

name: Sage's Brand
effectText:
This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches. While prepped, draw an additional card during your draw phase.
Cast: Deal 6 damage.

name: Scrying Bolt
effectText: Cast: Deal 5 damage. You may lose 1 charge. If you do, reveal the top two cards of the nemesis deck. Return them in any order.

name: Immolate
effectText:
While prepped, when you suffer 1 damage, gain 1 charge.
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: His charge is two-fold: to guide his former students as needed and to train the younglings that will fight for Gravehold when the others fall.

flavorText: These stones are among the most powerful in the labyrinth of lost caves. They are also the most corrupted. - Kadir, Breach Mage Delver

name: Creeping Viridian
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 3: Any player gains a Tainted Jade and places it in their hand. Advance the Tainted Track.
flavorText: Just outside the city walls there are men and women, frozen in green horror, like monuments to the Blight Lord's coming. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Shard Spitter
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player gains a Tainted Jade and places it on top of their deck.
flavorText: Renny Mumbast lost both eyes to these wretched things. So now, when the warning bells sound the Blight Lord's call, we wear goggles. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Vitrify
effectText: The players collectively gain two Tainted Jades and place them into their hands.
flavorText: The elders of Gravehold thought it wise to pave the streets of the dirt market in tumbled breach glass.

name: Dread Plinth
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Advance the Tainted Track twice.
flavorText: If it just touches your arm, count yourself lucky. Just chop the limb off before it's too late. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Ossify
effectText: The players collectively gain three Tainted Jades and place them on top of their decks.
flavorText: The Blight Lord's touch is enough to crystallize anything, living or otherwise.

name: Verdigra
effectText: Persistent: Any player suffers 3 damage. If this minion has 8 or less life, advance the Tainted Track.
flavorText: It's great that they shatter so easily, but not so much when they explode. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Glittering Doom
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Any player discards three cards in hand and then gains three Tainted Jades and places them into their hand.
flavorText: Malastar is convinced The Nameless seek to change us and then harvest us for some soul purpose. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Petrify
effectText:
Advance the Tainted Track twice.
OR
Gravehold suffers 8 damage.
flavorText: The elders say all worlds are born of dust. Perhaps it is fitting that we return to such. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Slag Horror
effectText: Persistent: Any player gains two Tainted Jades. Advance the Tainted Track.
flavorText: The Nameless bring with them legions of monstrosities. But the Blight Lord's favorites are the ones he breathes to life from the cave walls. - Kadir, Breach Mage Delver

name: Blinking Terror
effectText:
This minion is aligned to III.
Persistent: Any player loses 1 charge or suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: The Wayward One is a shepherd of sorts, guiding an army of lost horrors.

name: Irradiate
effectText: Any player suffers 2 damage. Any player discards a misaligned prepped spell.
flavorText: After the Wayward One had wandered back through the breach, the survivors of Gravehold were afflicted with strange maladies. One poor boy seemed to shift out of the world, only to return, screaming, hours later.

name: Quantum Maze
effectText: Power 2: If any player has an aligned spell, a player with an aligned spell suffers 5 damage.
flavorText: It is the Void and everything within it. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Feedback Coil
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: The player with the most misaligned prepped spells suffers 3 damage and discards two cards.
flavorText: It seems trapped between their world and ours, not quite belonging to either. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Fractured Nebula
effectText: Power 2: Shift Wayward One to IV. Gravehold suffers 8 damage. The players may collectively discard up to 2 aligned spells. For each spell discarded this way, prevent 4 of that damage.
flavorText: Within its twisted form, I saw the ragged teeth of infinity. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Warper
effectText: This minion is aligned to IV. When a player deals damage, that player must deal damage to this minion.
flavorText: How is this thing still alive? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Aether Flux
effectText: Power 2: If any player has two or more misaligned spells, a player with or more misaligned prepped spells suffers 7 damage.
flavorText: It is a being lost in agony as much as it is a monster. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Netherspawn
effectText:
This minion is aligned to II. Prevent all damage dealt to Wayward One.
Persistent: Any player destroys a breach. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: The Wayward One differs from the others in many ways, but its odd beasts are lethal nonetheless.

name: Shunt
effectText:
Any player suffers 5 damage.
OR
The player with the most prepped spells destroys all of their prepped spells.
flavorText: There are charred bones fused with the cave floor, all that is left from those it has touched.

name: Cinder
effectText:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
OR
Cast: Gain 2꒔.
flavorText: Nym is Malastar's most gifted and reckless apprentice. Brama has said it is as if the boy were born without a sense of fear, but perhaps fear is a virtue we need to learn.

name: Eternal Ember
effectText:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
OR
Cast: Cast one of your prepped spells without discarding it.
flavorText: There is an anger within her that makes her dangerous, unpredictable. If not for Brama's constant intercession, likely she would have met the gallows long ago.

name: Obsidian Shard
effectText: Gain 1꒔. You may suffer 1 damage. If you do, gain an additional 2꒔.
flavorText: They say she doesn't sleep. She just sharpens that blade of hers patiently, eager for a breach to bring her worthy foes.

name: Crushing Masses
effectText: Power 2: If there are no troggs in play, Unleash twice. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each trogg in play.
flavorText: If only they knew they were our forefathers, perhaps they would relent. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Night Raid
effectText: Unleash twice. Then, discard a trogg in play.
flavorText: They wait until we slumber, slithering through the caves without a sound. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Overwhelm
effectText: Unleash. The players collectively discard gems equal to the number of troggs in play.
flavorText: In The World That Was, there were myths of ancients, now lost to us, that walked the primordial wastes. They built Gravehold as a sanctuary from the chaos. The elders called them troggs.

name: Horde Hybrid
effectText: Immediately: Unleash. This minion becomes a trogg of the type that has the most of its type in play. When this is discarded, place it in Horde-Crone's discard pile.

name: Rabid Hysteria
effectText:
Immediately: Unleash twice.
Power 2: Any player suffers 1 damage for each trogg in play.
flavorText: They're rather making a mess of this home they want so badly. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Servitude to Evil
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash four times. Then, discard two troggs in play.
flavorText: One need only look in their hollow eyes to know their aim. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Besiege
effectText: Unleash twice. If there are three or fewer troggs in play, Unleash again until there are four troggs in play.
flavorText: The Horde-Crone has stirred the lost tribes from the bones of memory with a new, single-minded purpose: to reclaim Gravehold.

name: Underworld Totem
effectText:
When a player deals damage, that player must deal damage to a trogg if there are any troggs in play.
Immediately: Unleash twice.
Persistent: Unleash twice.
flavorText: The Troggs wandered the caves for aeons. Deep within the rock and shadow, they found their deity sleeping.

name: Wreak Havoc

flavorText: As long as they bleed... - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

flavorText: Afraid of my own shadow? Of course! - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

flavorText: There is a fire in all things. The others call it forth. But I, I snuff it out. - Quilius, Breach Mage Assassin

name: Afflict
effectText: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and may place a card in their discard pile into their hand.
flavorText: Such wisdom comes at a considerable price. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Catacomb Drone
effectText: Persistent: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: Kadir remains convinced the drones were once merely creatures from The Depths.

name: Encroach
effectText: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card was revealed, that player suffers 2 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Heart of Nothing
effectText:
To Discard: Discard four cards in hand.
Power 2: Unleash twice.
OR
Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: Beyond our world is a vast nothing. At the center of this lies The Nameless. - Mist, Voidwalker

name: Howling Spinners
effectText: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: The sound they make as they weave echoes through the cave is like the otherworldly throes of our lost companions. - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

name: Night Unending
effectText: Power 3: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.
flavorText: Here beneath The World That Was there is no day, no time really, just night unending. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Nix
effectText: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.
flavorText: It's as if the world itself is screaming. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Planar Collision
effectText:
To Discard: Discard two prepped spells.
Power 2: Unleash twice.
flavorText: None remembered the true name of The World That Was until Yan Magda spoke it aloud: Khasad Vol.

name: Thrash
effectText: Unleash. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.
flavorText: The creature thrashed as it burned, its massive body collapsing into the South Wall like a hot blade through cloth. - Garu, Oathsworn Keeper

name: Aphotic Sun
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 3 damage and loses all of their charges.
flavorText: The harsh light of the dead star burned away the dark as it crept through the breach. Amd around it I saw ravaged worlds The Nameless had already claimed. - Indira, Breach Apprentice

name: Chaos Flail
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash twice. Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck and shuffles it. Then, that player reveals the top two cards of their deck and destroys the most expensive card revealed.

name: Mage Ender
effectText: Persistent: The player with the most opened breaches suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: It sneered as it lunged at us, an awful maw of jagged teeth eager to end one of us, if not all. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Mangleroot
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. This minion suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: One of the few indigenous creatures of the cave, though corrupted from exposure to the breach. - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

name: Morbid Gyre
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 1: Unleash twice. The players collectively discard three cards in hand.
flavorText: It churned and roiled, a maelstrom of malign power. The void was upon me and yet I felt only the throes of freedom from my prison of sleep. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Mutilate
effectText: Unleash. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: They say that before The Nameless found Gravehold, nothing grew in these caves. It appears the cave burgeons through our blood. - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

name: Null Scion
effectText: Persistent: Unleash.
flavorText: Quilius's first blow glanced off its carapace like breach, but her second blow carved it in twain. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Smite
effectText: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: One side of this struggle must fall for the other to truly live. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Apocalypse Ritual
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Gravehold suffers 5 damage for each nemesis turn order card in the turn order discard pile.

name: Banish
effectText: Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells suffers 1 damage for each for their prepped spells.
flavorText: Get down! It's ejecting back at us! - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Cataclysmic Fate
effectText:
To Discard: Destroy a prepped spell that costs 5꒔ or more and a breach in which it was prepped.
Power 1: The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.

name: Monstrosity of Omens
effectText:
When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.
flavorText: Never have I seen such a creature, even among the ranks of The Nameless. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Engulf
effectText: Resolve the most recently discarded attack card in the nemesis discard pile.
flavorText: The Nameless rarely attack in the same fashion twice. It would seem today is an exception. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Quell
effectText:
Gravehold suffers 7 damage.
OR
Unleash three times.
flavorText: The Nameless hunger for the same thing we do: an end to this war. - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

name: Throttle
effectText: Unleash twice. Any player destroys their three most expensive cards in hand.
flavorText: Were I made of muscle and blood like the others, the impact would have surely ended me. - Remnant, Aetherial Entity

name: Withering Beam
effectText: Power 2: Unleash twice. The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.
flavorText: I watched a fellow merchant atrophy and fall to the ground in ash as the beam hit his cart. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Deep Abomination
effectText: Persistent: Each Player suffers 1 damage for each turn order card that player has in the turn order discard pile.
flavorText: It is said that each abomination is but the same creature from across all worlds twisted into a single form.

name: Hasten
effectText: Any player suffers damage equal to the number of nemesis tokens Gate Witch has. Unleash. Place this card on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
flavorText: Time is The Witch's domain, the one thing we have so little left. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Temporal Nimbus
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 6꒔.
Power 3: Unleash. Gate Witch draws an additional card during the nemesis draw phase this turn.

name: Nether Spiral
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 3: Choose any player's turn order card in the turn order discard pile. Shuffle the rest of the turn order cards into the turn order deck.
flavorText: Within the void, there are infinite spirals of worlds. Some are unborn, others are thriving. But there is a dead light in some that have been claimed by The Nameless. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Paradox Beast
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of nemesis tokens Gate Witch has.
flavorText: It moves between time and space, too quick for the eye and harder yet to strike. - Remnant, Aethereal Entity

name: Portal Wretch
effectText:
When this minion is discarded from play, shuffle a nemesis turn order card into the turn order deck.
Persistent: The player with the most charges suffers 2 damage.

name: Distort
effectText: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card is revealed, discard it. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 5 damage. Place this card on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
flavorText: Being pushed out of time is a painful ordeal even for me. - Remnant, Aethereal Entity

name: Infinite Enmity
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Unleash until Gate Witch has six nemesis tokens. Place this card on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
flavorText: Countless times we have won. And countless more we have lost. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Rift Scourge
effectText:
When this minion is discarded from play or the nemesis deck, place it on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
Persistent: Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: It lives outside of time and therefore cannot be slain. - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

name: Beseech
effectText: Place the acolyte in play with the lowest life on the bottom of the acolyte deck. Draw an acolyte. Unleash.
flavorText: The Hollow Crown gestured to the acolyte, who removed its mask and walked into the blinding light within the breach.

name: Enslave
effectText: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolyte in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects.
flavorText: It has but one weapon: blind obedience.

name: Thronewatch
effectText: Persistent: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of the acolyte with the lowest life. That acolyte suffers 1 additional damage.

name: Ascend
effectText: Unleash. The acolyte with the lowest life gains 10 life. Resolve that acolyte's Blood Magic effect.
flavorText: Perhaps it is not our doom, Brama. Perhaps it is our very maker. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Infernal Domain
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Draw an acolyte. Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolute in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects.

name: Reign
effectText: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of the acolyte with the most life. That acolyte suffers 6 additional damage. Unleash twice.
flavorText: As it passed through the city, men and women dropped to their knees faithfully, their eyes heavy with tears of awe.

name: Dominate
effectText: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolyte in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects. Repeat this one additional time.
flavorText: Behind their masks is nothing, youngling. They have made their choice. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Nameless Faith
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 1: Shuffle the two most recently discarded acolytes in the acolyte discard into the acolyte deck. Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolyte in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects.

name: Viscera Bride
effectText: Persistent: The acolyte with the lowest life gains 10 life. Resolve that acolyte's Blood Magic effect twice.
flavorText: All kings must have a queen. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Bezu
effectText: Gravehold and this minion suffer 1 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.
flavorText: We find wisdom in their great cruelty

name: Edryss Tragg
effectText: Any player suffers 2 damage. Then, if that player has 5 life or less, this minion suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: We become that which is most feared.

name: Holadran
effectText: Two different players each suffer 1 damage.
flavorText: We renounce our existence behind each mask.

name: Kurgax
effectText: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: We hunger to be nothing.

name: Lurzan
effectText: The player with the lowest life suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: We cull the weak to feed the worthy.

name: Mord
effectText:
Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
OR
Any player loses 1 charge, Gravehold suffers 1 damage, and this minion suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: We wipe the sister-words from our tongues to taste oblivion.

name: Nhavkalas
effectText: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. This minion suffers 1 damage.
flavorText: We cast aside the haven that has become our shackle.

name: Ren-Goda
effectText:
Any player suffers 2 damage.
OR
Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.
flavorText: We honor the void in blood.

name: Solara
effectText: Any player discards 2 cards in hand. This minion suffers 3 damage.
flavorText: We wield the breach in reverance to those from beyond it.

name: Dusk Spawn
effectText:
When this minion is dealt damage, Magus of Cleaks gains one nemesis token.
Persistent: Any player loses 1 charge or suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: It is shadow, given form and cruelty. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Rising Dark
effectText:
When Magus of Cloaks is dealt damage, discard this.
Power 3: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage. Any player destroys a prepped spell that costs 0꒔.
flavorText: Worlds are born and die in dark. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Twilight Empire
effectText: Power 3: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of nemesis tokens Magus of Cloaks has. Then, Magus of Cloaks gains one nemesis token.

name: Ashen Haruspex
effectText:
When this minion is dealt damage, prevent 2 of that damage.
Persistent: Any player suffers damage equal to half the number of nemesis tokens Magus of Cloaks has, rounded up.
flavorText: If any among us can kill the dark itself, it is Quilius. - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

name: Black Solstice
effectText:
When Magus of Cloaks is dealt damage, discard this.
Power 2: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 3 damage and discards a prepped spell.
flavorText: I could not tell if Ulgimor was afraid or simply angry. Can a shadow feel such things? - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Enshroud
effectText: Magus of Cloaks gains four nemesis tokens. The players collectively destroy two prepped spells that cost 0꒔.
flavorText: The shadows rose and swallowed what little light there was. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Eclipse
effectText: Magus of Cloaks gains five nemesis tokens. The player with the most expensive prepped spell destroys that spell and suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: We live in darkness, but they thrive in it. - Mist, Voidwalker

name: Shadow's Reach
effectText:
Immediately: Magus of Cloaks gains four nemesis tokens.
Power 9: Magus of Cloaks reaches its final form. Humanity is wiped out. The players lose the game.
flavorText: What little light we have shall be smothered in the end. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Veil Daughter
effectText:
When this minion is dealt damage, reduce that damage by the number of nemesis tokens Magus of Cloaks has.
Persistent: The player with the most charges suffers 4 damage.
flavorText: Where Ulgimor is merely a beast of shadow, the Veil Daughter is a darkling goddess. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Cryptid
effectText:
Persistent: The player with the most expensive prepped spell discards that spell.
OR
Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token.
flavorText: The beasts of this cave seem to revere The Titan as though it were some ancient god. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Grubber
effectText: Persistent: If the nemesis has two turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: Kick it, stab it, burn it... the thing just keeps grinning. - Sparrow, Breach Mage Soldier

name: Seismic Roar
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 6꒔.
Power 3: Umbra Titan loses two nemesis tokens.
flavorText: I roared as it bore through the rock. And Gravehold shuddered like those within its walls. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Maul
effectText:
The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.
OR
Umbra Titan loses two nemesis tokens.

name: Tombfright
effectText: Persistent: If Umbra Titan has 5 or more nemesis tokens, it loses a nemesis token. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
flavorText: With two heads, it's twice as eager to make a meal of a mage. - Sparrow, Breach Mage Soldier

name: Vault Behemoth
effectText: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage. If this minion has 8 or less life, Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token.
flavorText: The air rasping in its massive lungs is enough to burst your eardrums.

name: Crumble
effectText:
Umbra Titan loses three nemesis tokens.
OR
Unleash. Place the most recently discarded minion in the nemesis discard pile back into play.

name: Demi-Ancient
effectText: Persistent: Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token.
flavorText: In the time before ours, their kind thrived in the tumult of the fledgling world. Now, they seek a new home among The Nameless. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Yawning Black
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Any player suffers 6 damage.
OR
Umbra Titan loses three nemesis tokens.
flavorText: The Titan hides beneath the skin of the cave, emerging only to strike.

name: Turn Reminder
effectText:
Player Turn
Casting Phase
You may Cast any of your prepped spells in opened breaches. You must Cast any of your prepped spells in closed breaches. Place cast spells on top of your discard pile as they are cast.
Main Phase
You may resolve the following actions in any order and as many times as you want:
• Play a gem or relic card
• Gain a card
• Gain a charge
• Focus a breach
• Open a breach
• Prep a spell to a breach
• Resolve a "While prepped" effect
• Resolve a "To Discard" effect
Draw Phase Place all the gems and relics that you have played this turn on top of your discard pile in any order you choose. Draw cards from the top of your deck until you have five cards in your hand.
Nemesis Turn
Main Phase
From oldest to newest, resolve the effect of each power card and the Persistent: effect of each minion card the nemesis has in play.
Draw Phase
Draw a card from the nemesis deck.
• If it is an attack card: Resolve its effect immediately.
• If it is a minion card or a power card:
Place it into play with the appropriate number of life or power tokens.
Resolve any effects following "Immediately:" on the card.
The rest of its effects will not be resolve this turn.
When Exhausted
• Unleash twice.
• Destroy one of your breaches.
• Discard all of your charge tokens.
• Deal excess damage (x2) to Gravehold.

effectText:

OR

flavorText: Dirt is precious here, so we bury our dead in the darkness of The Depths. Or so we thought... - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: March on Gravehold
effectText:
To Discard: Lose 4 charges.
Power 2: If Knight of Shackles's breach I is open, any player suffers 4 damage. Otherwise, Unleash twice.

name: Siege
effectText: Unleash twice. Any player focuses their breach III.
flavorText: Only a breach mage would know Gravehold so well. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Chainsworn
effectText:
Immediately: Knight of Shackles focuses its breach III.
Persistent: Any player suffers 1 damage. That player suffers 1 additional damage for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has.
flavorText: It strode confidently among the dead upon its blighted steed, the glow of the breach radiating from it as they sieged the city.

name: Engine of War
effectText:
To Discard: Discard three prepped spells.
Power 2: Any player suffers 1 damage. That player suffers 2 additional damage for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has. Unleash.
flavorText: If Thraxir can become one of them, so can I. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Rout
effectText: If Knight of Shackles's breach Ⅰ is open, Gravehold suffers 6 damage. Otherwise, Knight of Shackles opens its breach I.
flavorText: Mist refuses to see Thraxir within this thing, but it's quite clear to the rest of us. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Deathless Legion
effectText:
Players cannot rotate Knight of Shackles's breaches.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Gravehold suffers 1 additional damage for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has.

name: End of All
effectText:
To Discard: Destroy three cards in hand that each cost 3꒔ or more.
Power 2: Knight of Shackles opens its closed breach with the lowest focus cost.
flavorText: Thraxir was once a breach mage commander, torn asunder by the one called Rageborne. Now he is a harbinger for The Nameless, the end of all.

name: Invade
effectText: If Knight of Shackles's breach Ⅱ is closed, Knight of Shackles opens that breach. Otherwise, for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has, place the most recently discarded power card into player with the number of power tokens indicated on the card.

name: Aether Barb
effectText: Power 2: Unleash. The players collectively discard cards in hand equal to the number of cards in the Thorn supply pile. Advance.
flavorText: It was as if a splinter was driven into my brain. And the words necessary to fight back were all but lost to me. - Indira, Breach Apprentice

name: Nettlewind
effectText: Persistent: If the Thorn supply pile is a spell, Advance. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavorText: Imagine a knife with winds... and teeth. - Sparrow, Breach Mage Soldier

name: Puncture

name: Stop E Front
effectText: This deck is the front of Evolve deck. Do not open this until instructed to do so.

name: Leviathan Egg Story
effectText:
The large egg begins to crack open, and a scaly hand bursts through the membrane. The creature claws its way out of the massive shell, its long, sharp teeth glistening. It won't take long for it to find its next meal.
Banish Leviathan Egg. Place card E03 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Leviathan Egg had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Immediately effect this game. Do not resolve this minions Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Leviathan Hatchling
effectText:
Immediately: If this is Chapter 4 or higher, Evolve.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
When you evolve this card, read card E18.

name: Hunted Story
effectText:
As the Nameless strikes you, a strange brand appears burned into your skin. Your chest tightens and you can't breathe. You know the Nameless aren't finish with you.
Banish Hunted. Place card E05 into the nemesis discard pile. The player who suffered damage from Hunted writes their name on E05.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Marked
effectText:
Unleash twice.
________________ suffers 3 damage.

name: A Rush of Power
effectText:
A massive breach opens and a swarm of metallic bugs surrounds you. You can feel the power of the newly opened breach surge through you.
Open Insight 3 and apply all rulebook stickers to the rulebook.
Apply a Fourth Breach sticker to the upper right-hand corner of each player's playmat.
Open Box A.
Give each player a Ⅳ breach. Each player places it to the right of their Ⅲ breach with the opened side face up. (During setup of all other games, Ⅳ breaches will start the game closed.)
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Newly Found Power
effectText:
At the end of your training, you can feel the power growing inside of you.
Mist reassures you, "You have proven yourself quite capable, and have been there to defend the survivors of Gravehold when they need you. I believe you're ready to take the next step... to open your final breach."
Open Insight 3 and apply all rulebook stickers to the rulebook.
Apply a Fourth Breach sticker to the upper right-hand corner of each player's playmat.
Open Box A. Give each player a Ⅳ breach.
Continue reading the front of L17.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Ambush Story
effectText:
Fungal Mesh seems more powerful, more volatile, than previous Nameless, as if it is drawing from unstable breach magic. You fear future Nameless will adapt as well.
Banish Ambush. Place card E09 into the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Waylay
effectText: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 1 damage for each player turn order card in the turn order discard pile.

name: Electric Pod Appears
effectText:
An Electric Pod surges into your vision, sizzling with power. You sense it overflowing with energy. It ignores you completely, hunting the survivors you brought with you.
Place this card next to Elecetric Pod.
When Electric Pod is discard, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
The survivors in your care are clearly relieved as the Electric Pod crumbles into the ground, its essence no longer bound. You're able to harness a bit of its dissipating energy. The player who discard Electric Pod gains 2 charges.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

name: Marked for Extermination
effectText:
The Spawning Horror senses which of you is at your weakest, and does its best to seperate you from the group. You can feel it stalking you, moving in for the kill.
Place this card next to the player with the lowest life. Return this to the evolve deck when the game ends.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Annihilate Story
effectText:
Your resistance to the Nameless's mental attacks have drawn their attention to you. If you had simply succumbed, they would have moved on. Now, they fear your power and have marked you as a prime taret for eradication.
Banish Annihilate. Place card E13 into the nemesis discard pile. The player who just discarded cards because of Annihilate writes their name on E13.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Eradicate
effectText:
Unleash twice.
_______________ discards their three most expensive cards in hand.

name: Maddening Spectre Story
effectText:
The Spectre has learned from watching your battles, adapting its body and skills in ways to better deflect your attacks, turning it into an even greater threat.
Banish Maddening Spectre. Place card E15 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that MAddening Specre had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Maddening Eidolon
effectText: Persistent: Unleash twice.

name: Spine Harvester Story
effectText:
Death has not stopped the Spine Harvester, it has only filled it with a need for vengeance. Its time in the dark has strengthened it, sharpening its bones and increaasing its bloodlust.
Banish Spine Harvester. Place card E17 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that Spine HArvester had before transitioning. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Spine Thresher
effectText:
Persisten: Unleah. Any player suffers 1 damage. Evolve.
If you can't place an evolve sticker, read card E54.

name: Leviathan Hatchling Story
effectText:
The hatchling has been feeding, finding no shortage of sustenance during this time of war. It has stored the energy it needs to grow, sprouting wings and massive teeth.
Banish Leviathan Hatchling. Place card E19 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Leviathan Hatchling had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Ravenous Leviathan
effectText:
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Evolve.
If you can't plave an evolve sticker, read card E32.

name: Caustic Larva Story
effectText:
The larvae have burroed deep underground, infecting your camp from below. In the protected darkness, they forget a toxic coccon for themselves, contaminating the air, spreading its sickness to New Gravehold.
Banish Caustic Larva. Place card E21 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Caustic Larva had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Caustic Cocoon
effectText:
Persistent: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Evolve.
If you can't place an evolve sticker, read card E40.

name: Sap Story
effectText:
Unsatiated, the Nameless has been searching for additional power. Finally, it has found the strength it needs in the nearby breach. Satisfied, it hunts you with renewed vigor.
Banish Sap. Place card E23 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Reap
effectText: Unleash twice. The player with the most charges loses 3 charges or suffers 3 damage.

name: Gathering Storm Story
effectText:
The skies darken as the circle closes -- the minions of the Nameless have completed their rituatl. They channel immense power, enough to decimate a mage, yet their goal is something far more sinister.
Banish Gathering Storm. Place card E25 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Thunderous Tempest
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 9꒔.
Power 2: Unleash. If there are two nemesis turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, any player suffers 8 damage. Otherwise, any player suffers 5 damage.

name: Facet Ogre Story
effectText:
The Ogre becomes enraged in the face of your assault, brushing off your attacks as its madness boils over. The Ogre knows it is wounded and, as a last act, will destroy the very ground upon which you stand.
Banish Facet Ogre. Place card E27 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that Facet Ogre had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Facet Juggernaut
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Gravehold suffers additional damage equal to the number of shield tokens this minion has.

name: Suffocate Story
effectText:
The Nameless has sent its minions on a mission to raze New Gravehold. You had a difficult choice: stop the minions and save New Gravehold, or prevent the Nameless from recovering and gaining even more power.
Banish Suffocate. Place card E29 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Sacrifice
effectText:
Unleash four times.
OR
Gravehold suffers 4 damage and any player suffers 4 damage.

name: Endless Chasm Story
effectText:
The Nameless's greed is a bottomless chasm and it will take verything you have if not stopped.
Enraged by your refusal to appease its demands, the eye of the Nameless narrows onto you.
Banish Endless Chasm. Place card E31 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Eternal Glare
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 3: Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If it's a player turn order card, Unleash three times. Otherwise any player suffers 5 damage.

name: Ravenous Leviathan Story
effectText:
The Leviathan has been feeding from the breach, becoming smarter and quicker, growing in size and in hunger. Its body is sleeker now, allowing it to cut through the skies and slither rapidly towards its prey.
Banish Ravenous Leviathan. Place card E33 into play with the same number of tokens on it that Ravenous Leviathan had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persisten effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Skybound Leviathan
effectText: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player discards a card in hand.

name: Conduct Story
effectText:
Your ability to store charges has caught the eye of the Nameless. They seek that power, and will hunt you down to feed upon you. You are able to draw more charges from their attacks, which only make you more of a target.
Banish Conduct. Place card E35 in the nemesis discard pile. Write the name of the player who suffered damage from Conduct on E35.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Disrupt
effectText: Unleash. _______________ suffers 4 damage and gains 2 charges.

name: Daze Story
effectText:
The Nameless seeks to disrupt your balance, striking in ways to ruin your concentration. You find yourself unable to keep track of the Nameless, and feel helpless in this battle.
Banish Daze. Place card E37 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Paralyze
effectText: Unleash. The player with the lowest life suffers 2 damage.

name: Tremor Story
effectText:
The Nameless seeks to destroy New Gravehold, but your people's resilience only angers it further. You sense they have learned something crucial about your defense, something that will make the next attack that much harder to hold off.
Banish Tremor. Place card E39 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Crushing Wave
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Unleash twice. If Gravehold has 15 life or more, Gravehold suffers 6 damage. Otherwise, any player suffers 4 damage.

name: Caustic Cocoon Story
effectText:
You watch in horror as the Cocoon begins to break apart, unleashing the monstrosity that was gestating within. Acid coats the ground, dissolving anything it touches. The emerging creature is covered in this toxin.
Banish Caustic Cocoon. Place card E41 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Caustic Cocoon had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Caustic Soldier
effectText:
Persistent: Unleash.
Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Drain Story
effectText:
The Nameless have learned to adapt to your attacks, watching and waiting for you to prep your strongest spells before striking. In the future you must be more careful, as the Nameless are growing smarter.
Banish Drain. Place card E43 in the nemesis pile. Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Deplete
effectText:
Unleash twice.
Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
The player with the most expensive prepped spell discards that spell.

name: Tempting Offer Story
effectText:
The breach mages speak of a ritual, a pact that can be made to keep the Nameless away. You will have to pay its price eventually, but for now you are spared.
Banish Tempting Offer. Place card E45 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Dark Bond
effectText:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.

name: Flash of Decay Story
effectText:
The longer you stand in the light of the beam, the more it takes hold on your body. Your knees feel weak, your lefts feel like they can no longer support you. You wobble slightly, learning against a boulder for support.
Banish Flash of Decay. Place card E47 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Ray of Desolation
effectText: Power 1: Unleash twice. The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.

name: Creeping Curse Story
effectText:
You feel the curse take shape, bubbling under your skin like a plague. It is your burden to end this curse before it can spread, and you must study it without succumbing fully to its madness.
Banish Creeping Curse. Place card E49 in the nemesis discard pile. Write the name of the player who evolved Creeping Curse on card E49.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Calamitous Bane
effectText:
To Discard: _______________ discard a card in hand that costs 3꒔ or more during their turn.
Power 3: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage. The players collectively discard three cards in hand.

name: Scatter Story
effectText:
You fend off the attack with an ease that makes you uncomfortable. You wonder what the Nameless's goal was. You worry that you missed something, and fear what knowledge they gained.
Banish Scatter. Place card E51 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Demolish
effectText:
Unleash three times.
Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Any player destroys three cards in hand.

name: Aether Extract Story
effectText:
The Nameless yearns to feed on your gems, the source of power you use to control your breaches. Your offering does not satisfy the Nameless, and so it will continue to hunt you, devouring your spells.
Banish Aether Extract. Place card E53 in the nemesis discard pile. Write the name of the player who discards the gems because of Aether Extract on card E53.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Unforeseen Collapse
effectText: Power 2: Unleash twice. _______________ discards their most expensive prepped spell.

name: Spine Thresher Story
effectText:
Over time, the Nameless have imbued their disturbing creation with even more power, growing its bone spines and sharpening their points. The nightmare hunts you now, waiting for the right moment to strike.
Banish Spine Thresher. Place card E55 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that Spine Thresher had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Spine Reaper
effectText: Persistent: Unleash. Any player suffers 2 damage.

name: Brama, Infested Appears
effectText:
A figure jerkily stumbles into view from behind a massive tree trunk. Her words are slurred, "Get back." Suddenly, her eyes narrow in on you as her hands raise. You recognize the spell she's about to cast.
Place this card next to Brama, Infested. When Brama, Infested is discard, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
Your attacks disrupted Fungal Mesh's control over Brama. In the moments before fainting, she musters enough willpower to aid you. Brama heals one of you. Any player gains 2 life.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

name: Smoke Guardian Appears
effectText:
A glowing figure emerges from the dense fog surrounding your battle. Its sharp edges and razor teeth are eerily illuminated by its innate aura, turning it into a nightmarish vision.
Place this card next to Smoke Guardian. When Smoke guardian is discarded, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
As the smoke dissipates, you find a discarded dirty object, giving off a familiar hum of energy. You scrape off the grime to find a previous gem hidden beneath.
The player who discarded Smoke Guardian gains a gem from the most expensive gem supply pile and places it into their hand.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

name: Humming Hive Story
effectText:
As the hive's defenders repeatedly strike and absord your blood, they change before your eyes, mutating into larger, faster drones that crave another taste of your blood.
Banish Humming Hive. Place card E59 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that Humming Hive had before transforming. Write the name of the player who last suffered damage from Humming Hive on card E59. Do not resolve this minions Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Humming Drones
effectText:
This minion can have any number of shield tokens.
Persistent: This minion gains one shield token. _______________ suffers damage equal to the number of shield tokens this minion has.

name: Kinetic Construct Attacks Brama
effectText:
The Kinetic Construct appears, a glowing configuration of prisms and shapes, crackling with a cascade of energy. Arcs of electricity spout from the beast, shocking Brama and pinning her to the ground.
Defeat Kinetic Construct to rescue Brama. Place this card next to Kinetic Construct. When Kinetic Construct is discard, read the back of this card. Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
As the lifeless construct crumbles, Brama is free to redirect the stores of energy she was using to defend herself.
The player who discard Kinetic Construct gains a card, that gains pulse tokens, from any supply pile. That player does nto suffer damage from Deathmind for gaining this card.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

name: Ease Brama's Burden
effectText:
The air is full of energy, both from your attacks and the power Brama is using to keep Deathmind at bay. She is able to direct that energy into one large burst, giving you an immediate advantage. The player who discarded Brama's Torment gains a card that costs 5꒔ or less from any supply pile. That player does not suffer damage from Deathmind for gaining this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Bladius Summon
effectText:
Maelstrom emits a sound you recognize from the first time you fought it. That sound summoned Bladius. However, since you defeated Bladius months ago, Maelstrom is no longer able to on it for support.
Banish Bladius and draw another nemesis card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Bladius Returns
effectText:
Maelstrom emits a sound you recognize from the first time you fought it. That sound summoned Bladius. Having escaped your battle with it months ago, Bladius is back to serve Maelstrom. He is battle-scarred and broken, yet its one good eye glares at you with a desire for bengeance boring on madness. Return this card to the evolve deck.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Pretalus of Lore Appears
effectText:
This creature is a conduit for Xaxos. You can see it fueling him, making each spell more powerful. Maybe there's powere here that you can take for yourself.
Place this card next to Prelatus of Lore. When Prelatus of Lore is discard, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
The prelatus finally falls to your assault. Wasting no time, you rush to its side and absorb as much of its energy as possible. Xaxos takes notice and shrieks with rage. You narrowly avoid a blast of flame as you retrat to a more defensible position. The player who discard Pretalus of Lore tucks this card under one of their opened breaches. For the rest of the game, spells cast from this breach deal 1 additional damage.
At the end of the game, return this card to the Evolve deck.
+1 Damage on Cast.

name: Turn Reminder
effectText:
Player Turn
Casting Phase
You may Cast any of your prepped spells in opened breaches. You must Cast any of your prepped spells in closed breaches. Place cast spells on top of your discard pile as they are cast.
Main Phase
You may resolve the following actions in any order and as many times as you want:
• Play a gem or relic card
• Gain a card
• Focus a breach
• Open a breach
• Prep a spell to a breach
• Resolve a "While prepped" effect
• Resolve a "To Discard" effect
• Gain a charge
• Activate your ability
Draw Phase Place all the gems and relics that you have played this turn on top of your discard pile in any order you choose. Draw cards from the top of your deck until you have five cards in your hand.
Nemesis Turn
Main Phase
From oldest to newest, resolve the effect of each power card and the Persistent: effect of each minion card the nemesis has in play.
Draw Phase
Draw a card from the nemesis deck.
• If it is an attack card: Resolve its effect immediately.
• If it is a minion card or a power card:
Place it into play with the appropriate number of life or power tokens.
Resolve any effects following "Immediately:" on the card.
The rest of its effects will not be resolve this turn.
